document_data.name: Wereape
document_data.mainbody: A '''wereape''' was a type of [[lycanthrope]] that could turn into an [[ape]].
document_data.Description: These weretypes could be [[hill giant]]s in their original [[humanoid]] form.
document_data.History: In [[467 DR]], a [[dire]] wereape known as [[Dermos|Dermos the Proud]] claimed to be the [[deity]] of [[evil]] lycanthropes, [[Malar]]. His following quickly became large, filled with zealous members, who were ordered to kill all [[Arkaiun]]s who would oppose them. Him and all members of his beast cult would be killed two years later, in the {{YearlinkName|469}}, at the [[Ambush of Blackrock Ridge]].
